title: Admin Dashboard Overview Displays Correct Metrics
description: Verify that the admin dashboard displays accurate user statistics, task analytics, and real-time metrics with charts updated based on selected date filters.

steps.description: Login as Admin user
Navigate to Admin Dashboard page
Verify greeting time is appropriate to current time
Verify date filters are present and can be changed
Select different date ranges from date filter
Verify user statistics, task analytics and graphs update accordingly
Check that charts render correctly using Chart.js

title: User Management Role Promotion and Demotion
description: Ensure that Admin users can promote and demote user roles correctly and user list reflects the changes in real-time.

steps.description: Login as Admin
Navigate to User Management page
Locate a User with 'User' role in user list
Promote the user role to 'Admin'
Verify user role changes and is persisted
Demote the previously promoted user back to 'User'
Confirm the role demotion is reflected correctly

title: Task Management Enhanced Kanban Board CRUD Operations
description: Validate task creation, editing, deletion, status update, drag-and-drop reordering on the Kanban board and verify data persistence.

steps.description: Login as Admin
Navigate to Enhanced Task Management Kanban Board
Create new task with valid details including status and deadline
Verify new task appears in correct Kanban status column
Edit task description, status and deadline
Confirm updates are saved and reflected on the board
Drag and drop task from one status column to another
Check task reordering and status reflects changes
Delete the created task
Verify task is removed from the Kanban board and database

title: Announcement Management Creation and Section Filtering
description: Test creation, editing, deletion of announcements and verify filtering for specific user sections works correctly.

steps.description: Login as Admin
Navigate to Announcement Management
Create new announcement with title, message and assign to section(s)
Verify new announcement appears in announcement list
Use section filter to view announcements specific to a section
Confirm that announcements match the selected section
Edit announcement details and save
Confirm edited announcement updates in the list
Delete the announcement
Check the announcement is removed

title: Course Management Bulk Import and Filtering
description: Ensure bulk import feature for courses works correctly and course list reflects accurate filtering based on sections.

steps.description: Login as Admin
Navigate to Course Management
Perform bulk import of multiple course records using valid import file
Verify all imported courses appear in course list
Filter courses by section
Confirm that filtered course list only shows courses belonging to that section
Edit a course entry and save changes
Check that edits are persisted and visible

title: Teacher Management CRUD and Bulk Import
description: Validate creating, editing, deleting teacher records, bulk import functionality, and filtering by section.

steps.description: Login as Admin
Navigate to Teacher Management
Create new teacher record with all mandatory fields
Ensure new teacher appears in teacher list
Edit teacher details and save
Verify updates are saved and displayed correctly
Delete a teacher
Confirm teacher is removed from list
Perform bulk import of teachers
Check all imported teachers are added successfully
Use section filter on teacher list
Validate list only shows teachers associated with selected section

title: Study Materials Upload, Delete, and Organization
description: Ensure users can upload, delete, and organize study materials linked to courses with accurate reflection on UI and persistence.

steps.description: Login as Admin
Navigate to Study Materials Management
Upload a study material file and link it to a course
Verify the material is listed under that course
Organize materials by editing metadata (e.g., title, category)
Confirm updates are shown properly
Delete an uploaded study material
Check material is removed from list and storage

title: Lecture Slides Upload, Preview, and Organization
description: Test lecture slides upload, preview functionality, and organization tied to correct course sections.

steps.description: Login as Admin
Navigate to Lecture Slides Management
Upload a lecture slide file and assign section
Verify slide appears within the assigned section
Preview the uploaded lecture slide
Confirm the slide preview loads correctly without errors
Organize slides by editing details
Verify changes are saved and reflected

title: Routine Management Slot Creation and Bulk Import
description: Validate creation of routine slots, bulk importing schedule data, activation/deactivation of routines, and time slot management.

steps.description: Login as Admin
Navigate to Routine Management
Create a new routine slot with valid time and details
Verify new slot appears in routine list
Perform bulk import of routine slots via file upload
Ensure all slots from import appear correctly
Activate and deactivate a routine slot
Confirm activation status toggles and is saved

title: Super Admin Audit Logs and Admin Management
description: Check that Super Admin can view audit logs, manage admin accounts including creation, editing and deletion, and view system-wide analytics.

steps.description: Login as Super Admin
Navigate to Super Admin Dashboard
Verify system-wide analytics data is displayed accurately
Access Admin Management section
Create a new admin user
Check that new admin appears in the admin list and can log in
Edit existing admin details
Validate changes save and reflect in admin profile
Delete an admin user
Confirm admin is removed from the list and access revoked
View audit logs
Verify audit logs show recent system activities accurately

title: Side Navigation Responsive Behavior on Various Devices
description: Verify side navigation collapses and expands correctly, supports tab management and works seamlessly across mobile, tablet, and desktop screen sizes.

steps.description: Login as Admin
View side navigation on desktop viewport
Ensure side nav is visible, collapsible, and tabs behave correctly
Resize viewport to tablet size
Confirm side navigation adapts and remains usable
Resize viewport to mobile size
Verify side navigation collapses into mobile menu with accessible tab management

title: Task Analytics Display with Virtualized Lists
description: Verify task analytics components render correct visual data and virtualization is effective with large datasets, maintaining smooth UI animations.

steps.description: Login as Admin
Navigate to Task Analytics page
Ensure charts correctly display task completion and status metrics
Load large dataset of tasks
Validate virtualization works by measuring render performance and scroll smoothness
Verify UI animations execute smoothly using Framer Motion

title: Notification System Push and In-App Alerts for Deadlines
description: Test push notifications via Capacitor and Firebase as well as in-app alerts trigger correctly for upcoming deadlines and announcements.

steps.description: Login as user with tasks having upcoming deadlines
Wait for notification trigger time based on task deadline
Verify push notification is received on supported devices
Confirm in-app alert appears when app is open
Trigger announcement creation assigned to user section
Check user receives push and in-app notifications for announcement

title: Security Enforcement of Role-Based Access Control
description: Validate that users cannot access unauthorized admin or super admin features and all environment variables and backend APIs are secured with Supabase RLS.

steps.description: Login as regular User
Attempt to access Admin Dashboard and Super Admin features via URL
Verify access is denied and redirected appropriately
Login as Admin
Check access permissions for Super Admin features
Confirm access is denied
Review backend API calls and environment variable usage
Check Supabase Row Level Security (RLS) policies restrict data access correctly

title: Offline Support and UI Responsiveness
description: Test that UI remains responsive and functional with offline support enabled, with appropriate fallback messages for features requiring connectivity.

steps.description: Login as user
Simulate offline mode on device
Verify UI loads cached data correctly
Attempt to perform data actions that require connectivity and verify appropriate error or fallback messages
Restore network connection
Confirm that data syncs correctly and UI updates
